original_text: So Joshua and the Israelites destroyed nearly all the Amorite armies. But a few of the Amorites escaped and they reached their strong cities.
korean_text: 여호수아와 이스라엘 자손이 그들을 크게 살륙하여 거의 멸하였고 그 남은 몇 사람은 견고한 성들로 들어간 고로

sentences.original_text: So Joshua and the Israelites destroyed
But a few of the Amorites escaped
and they reached their strong cities.
